summary: This is a certification from Municipal Credit Union responding to a subpoena duces tecum, confirming the production of certain financial records (excluding checks, credit card statements, SARs, and CTRs) related to an investigation. It is signed by Tova Noel and notarized by Patricia Gonzalez.

persons.name: Tova Noel
persons.context: She is the authorized custodian of records at Municipal Credit Union who certifies the accuracy and completeness of the documents produced in response to a subpoena.

persons.name: Patricia Gonzalez
persons.context: She notarized the certification document, confirming Tova Noel's signature and oath.

connections.description: Patricia Gonzalez notarized the business record certification signed by Tova Noel.

events.title: Response to Subpoena Duces Tecum
events.description: Municipal Credit Union, through custodian Tova Noel, certifies the production of records in response to a subpoena duces tecum as part of an investigation.

keyFacts: Municipal Credit Union produced records in response to a subpoena duces tecum related to an investigation (reference SUB9316-DJ).
The certification explicitly states that the produced records do NOT include checks, credit card statements, Suspicious Activity Reports (SARs), or Currency Transaction Reports (CTRs).
Tova Noel, as custodian, certified the accuracy and completeness of the records on behalf of the credit union in 2019.
The document is a formal business record certification pursuant to C.P.L.R. 3122-a, indicating it was likely part of a legal proceeding or investigation.
